attributes.action: Allow all commonwealth nationals serving in the Army for Queen and county citizenship FREE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With no cost to them. Currently any foreign national must be resident in the UK or serving for 5 years, pay the Home Office a fee £655 for Citizenship, do the test and then apply for the British passport.  I think that this is total wrong for those in the commonwealth, as they are fighting in Afghanistan and Iraq loosing limbs and life but still unable to be officially acknowledged as "British".  They are also required to pay £750 for (ILR) Indefinite Leave to Remain but only after they have been serving for 4 years.
